title: I'm not backing down!
text: life shrinks and expands on the proportion of your willingness to take risks and try new things.

title: Another chance
text: Cheer up when the night comes, because mornings always give you another chance.

title: Keep Going
text: When everything feels like an uphill struggle, just think of the view from the top.

title: Live It Up
text: Life is too short for us to dwell on sadness. Cheer up and live life to the fullest.
